title: Secret Evidence: ‘Persons of interest’ remain in Missy Bevers murder probe
itunes:title: Secret Evidence: ‘Persons of interest’ remain in Missy Bevers murder probe
description:
Midlothian, Texas, police still have “persons of interest” in the Missy Bevers murder probe, but they are keeping key evidence a secret for now, Assistant Chief Kevin Johnson says. The chief breaks a 6-month silence about the case on the first anniversary of the fitness instructor’s death in this episode, telling Nancy Grace and Alan Duke why investigators have been so “judicious” in what they make public about the shocking murder inside a church.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
